category.name: Mail
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: IDSM_dsa_notification_email_address
preference.preference_description: Determines which administrators are notified by e-mail when system administration data (such as organization data, relation types, revision rules) is received from a remote site with the dsa_util utility. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values. Each string must be a valid Teamcenter e-mail address, separated by a semicolon.
